q_en: Which cutting tasks use Cotton Fabric?
gt:
Sure thing! Let's dive into the cutting tasks that use **Cotton Fabric**. Here's a neat table for you:

| Cutting Task ID |
|-----------------|
| 1               |
| 2               |
| 3               |
| 6               |
| 7               |
| 8               |
| 9               |
| 12              |
| 13              |
| 14              |
| 15              |
| 18              |
| 19              |
| 20              |
| 21              |
| 22              |
| 25              |
| 29              |
| 30              |
| 33              |
| 34              |

These tasks are all about working with that lovely Cotton Fabric! If you have more questions, feel free to ask. I'm here to help! üòÑ

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM materials WHERE name = 'Cotton Fabric';
steps.description: Retrieve the material ID for the material with the name "Cotton Fabric"

steps.sql: SELECT wip_id FROM wip_material WHERE origin_material_id = '1';
steps.description: Retrieve the WIP material ID that uses the original material "Cotton Fabric"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM cutting_tasks WHERE produced_wip_id = '10';
steps.description: Retrieve the cutting task IDs that produce the WIP material using "Cotton Fabric"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM cutting_tasks WHERE produced_wip_id = '12';
steps.description: Retrieve the cutting task IDs that produce the WIP material using "Cotton Fabric"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM cutting_tasks WHERE produced_wip_id = '2';
steps.description: Retrieve the cutting task IDs that produce the WIP material using "Cotton Fabric"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM cutting_tasks WHERE produced_wip_id = '6';
steps.description: Retrieve the cutting task IDs that produce the WIP material using "Cotton Fabric"
